block.p: Tessa Sinead Rowan, a daughter of Patricia C. Rowan of Clearwater Beach, Fla., and the late Dr. Patrick J. Rowan, was married yesterday to Gerrit Johnston Goss, a son of Representative Porter J. Goss and Mrs. Goss of Sanibel Island, Fla., and Washington.
The Rev. Alan J. R. Neale performed the ceremony at St. Columba's Episcopal Chapel in Middletown, R.I.

Tessa Sinead Rowan, a daughter of Patricia C. Rowan of Clearwater Beach, Fla., and the late Dr. Patrick J. Rowan, was married yesterday to Gerrit Johnston Goss, a son of Representative Porter J. Goss and Mrs. Goss of Sanibel Island, Fla., and Washington.
The Rev. Alan J. R. Neale performed the ceremony at St. Columba's Episcopal Chapel in Middletown, R.I.
Mrs. Goss, 25, was until August a trading floor assistant at Deutsche Bank in New York. She graduated from Rollins College. Her father, an ophthalmologist, practiced in New Port Richey, Fla.

Mr. Goss, 30, is a landscape designer at Madison Cox Design, a landscape design firm in New York. He graduated cum laude from Rollins and received a master's degree in landscape architecture from the University of Virginia. His father, a Republican, is the chairman of the Select Committee on Intelligence in the House of Representatives.
